webscript.shortname: Add or update a Custom Property Definition to the custom model
webscript.description:
This webscript can be used either to create a custom property definition with a particular
propId or to update an existing property definition.

In the case of create, the 'element' query-param is mandatory and
should have one of the following values:
'recordSeries', 'recordCategory', 'recordFolder' or 'record'.

The value for 'propId' must only contain URL/QName-valid characters and it must also be unique.

The body of the PUT should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "label" : "original label",
   "dataType" : "d:boolean",
   "mandatory" : false
}

In the case of an update to an existing property definition, there is currently support for
updating the 'label' only. In this case there is no need to specify an 'element' query param.
{
   "label" : "updated label",
}
